menu: Getting weird text printed out? Remember to check settings and switch to "plain text mode"!
Save your character files often in the character editor!
The loot tables really need to be rebalanced lol
Custom NPC creation support coming soon!
Have any issues? Send a bug report to me.

cynic.name: Cynic
negotiatedone: Alright. You better not fuck me over this time.
negotiatefail: Nice try with your fancy words.
attacked: Really? Sneaking up on me? That's low.
chasing: I'll fuckin find you sooner or later!

boastful.name: Boastful
havebetter: I already got a better weapon.
negotiating: I've already taken down people worse than you, man.
negotiatefail: You really thought I wouldn't see through that?
attacked: Ha, you think you could sneak up on me?
